item.description:
Order tickets via Eventbrite:
http://gameonpreaknessparty-efbevent.eventbrite.com/

Game On is celebrating the 138th Preakness Stakes on Saturday May 18th, starting at 5pm! Join us to watch the race as well as hit baseballs in Game On's very own batting cages, win some cool prizes in the "pick a pony" games and much more!!

- The Official Cocktail of The Preakness- Black Eyed Susan Cocktail

- Crab Cake Specials

- Corn Hole

- Take batting practice in the Official MLB Batting Cages

- "Pick a Pony" buckets, winners get awesome prizes!

- Giveaways!!

Skyboxes available for private groups. For more information email jadams@gameonboston.com
item.name: Game On Fenway Preakness Party
